description: Check what help you might be able to get with childcare schemes like tax credits, Tax-Free Childcare, childcare vouchers and free childcare or education for 2 to 4-year-olds

details.introductory_paragraph:
Use this calculator to find out how much you could get towards approved childcare, including:

  • free childcare for children aged between 2 and 4
  • help with childcare costs if your child is under 16 (or under 17 and disabled)

This service is also available in Welsh (Cymraeg).

available_translations.title: Check what help you could get with childcare costs

contents.text: Check what help you could get with childcare costs
You can only get help with 'approved childcare'.
Find out what 'approved childcare' is

steps.title: Find out if you can get help with childcare costs

contents.text: Find a nursery school place
Find a registered childminder
Search for free early education and childcare

steps.title: Find where you can get childcare

contents.text: You can get help with childcare costs for children under 18. You might be able to apply for:
Tax-Free Childcare
tax credits
Universal Credit
help while you study
You could also get free hours childcare when your child is aged 2 to 4. You might be able to apply for:
free education and childcare for 2 year olds
15 hours free childcare for 3 to 4 year olds
free childcare if you're working
You can only get childcare vouchers if you have already joined a scheme.
Check the rules for childcare vouchers

steps.title: Get help paying for childcare

contents.text: Tell government straight away if your circumstances change and you're getting:
tax credits
Universal Credit
If you're getting free childcare if you're working or Tax-Free Childcare you have to confirm if your details are up to date every 3 months.
Sign into your childcare account to find out when you next have to check your details
Your eligibility for support with childcare costs might also change.
Check if your eligibility for help with childcare costs has changed

steps.title: Check what to do if your circumstances change

contents.text: Apply for a primary school place
Find before and after school and holiday clubs
You might be able to use help like tax credits or Tax-Free Childcare to pay for childcare like wraparound care, after school clubs or other activities.

steps.title: Check what to do when your child reaches school age

pages_part_of_step_nav.title: Check what help you could get with childcare costs

contents.text: Check if you're eligible for Tax-Free Childcare
Find out what types of childcare you can use

steps.title: Check you're eligible

contents.text: Your tax credits will stop immediately if you successfully apply for Tax-Free Childcare.
You (and your partner, if you have one) will also have to cancel your Universal Credit and childcare vouchers.
Before you apply, check if it's the right option for you.
Check if you'll be better off

steps.title: Check if you'll be better off

contents.text: There's one application for Tax-Free Childcare and free childcare if you're working. As part of your application, you will find out if you can get both.
Apply online for Tax-Free Childcare
If you're eligible you'll get a childcare account. You can use this to pay your childcare provider.

steps.title: Apply for Tax-Free Childcare

contents.text: Sign in to your childcare account

steps.title: Sign in to your account to pay your childcare provider

contents.text: You must confirm your details are up to date every 3 months.
Sign in to your childcare account to confirm your details

steps.title: Reconfirm your details every 3 months

step_by_step_nav.title: Get Tax-Free Childcare: step by step

pages_part_of_step_nav.title: Check what help you could get with childcare costs

part_of_step_navs.title: Get Tax-Free Childcare: step by step

contents.text: Check if you're eligible for free childcare if you're working
Find out what types of childcare you can use

steps.title: Check you're eligible

contents.text: Getting free childcare might affect how much you get in tax credits.
Check if you’ll be better off

steps.title: Check if you'll be better off

contents.text: There's one application for free childcare if you're working and Tax-Free Childcare. As part of your application, you will find out if you can get both.
Apply online
If you're eligible you'll get a childcare account and a code for free childcare.

steps.title: Apply for free childcare if you're working

contents.text: Give the code in your childcare account to your provider along with:
your National Insurance number
your child's date of birth

steps.title: Give your code to your childcare provider

contents.text: You must confirm your details are up to date every 3 months or your code will expire.
Sign in to your childcare account to confirm your details

steps.title: Sign in to your account to reconfirm your details
